name: Self-Defeating
description: Surrealistrasyon//Şerif Gümüşbaş//Digital Art//2500x3000 pixel//We are almost always looking for the enemy outside. Whereas, if we knew all the harm we have done to ourselves, most of our enemies would look like friends//Drawing is an impressive language for me with its universal and differentiating structure in every viewer. I also love and use the automatism method because it is a pleasant and mysterious way to express myself and what I perceive about existence, the world, and life
